name: iOS
description:
*iOS CANNOT prevent screenshots. Taking a screenshot does NOT prevent it from being stored in the gallery.  
*iOS CAN detect screenshots and WILL notify the fan that screenshots will not work when entering the gate. 
*Screenshot detection is only enabled when there is a shared secret associated with a ticket. (tickets w/out secret will still be allowed without notification)
**If an event has multiple tickets but only 1 ticket has a shared secret associated, we will “enable” screenshot detection for all tickets in that event.

name: Tracking - Scan View tracked  for screenshot attempt
description: [BP-9640](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9640):Scan View - Track action for screenshot attempt

name: Android
description:
*Android notifies the fan when a screenshot is taken and prevent it from being stored in the local gallery. 
*Screenshot prevention is only enabled when there is a shared secret associated with a ticket.
**If an event has multiple tickets but only 1 ticket has a shared secret associated, we will “enable” screenshot prevention for all tickets in that event.

Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image should be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.
